comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blanca_Err%C3%A1zuriz Blanca Elena Errázuriz Vergara (April 9, 1894 - March 20, 1940), also known as Bianca de Saulles was accused and later acquitted of killing her first husband, John de Saulles.
